idea-plugin.name: ChatGPTBaby
idea-plugin.description:
This is a ChatGPT tool plugin. You just need to input the API Key provided by OpenAI, and you can have a conversation with ChatGPT. As you can see, it is a baby, but it is growing rapidly.
plugin address：https://github.com/caijianying/ChatGPTBaby

Thank you for downloading and supporting this plugin. However, as it is no longer being maintained, this will be the last updated version.

If you are interested in ChatGPT, I suggest trying out my new plugin. Whether you are a beginner or an experienced developer, this plugin can save you time and energy in problem-solving. Thank you for considering it again. If you have any questions or suggestions regarding its usage, please feel free to contact me via email.

new plugin address：https://plugins.jetbrains.com/plugin/21314-chatgpt-coding
